comment: This restaurant has a various menu with many dishes from all over the world which can really satisfy me.
name: Tran Huong

comment: I really love the menu for vegans. It tastes amazing, really nice services. I want to go bach to this restaurant for thousands.

comment: The atmosphere of the restaurant is definitely amazing. It is really suitable for family meals.

comment: I am interested in how all the furniture and waitors serve for all customer. It is an important factor for an elegant meal.
